Posts.Content: Oct 30, 2012 06:46PM Kentuckywonderwoman wrote: This is my first time to post as well. I start chemo Nov. 20. Right now I am trying to decide on the right mix. I am leaning towards Taxol and Herceptin but am getting a second opinion first. I don't want to do more than I need to avoid SE that my onc says may be more detrimental than the benefits. I'm struggling to do the right thing AND really worried about the chemo. Thanks to everyone who posts. It helps to calm my fears. I am Stage 1a Her2 positive , negative nodes (2).
Posts.Title: Starting Chemo Nov. 2012 Angel67 michellej1980
